dataIdInfo.idAbs: This dataset contains the polygons of the cities, greater cities and larger urban zones as defined for the Urban Audit 2012.
dataIdInfo.idPurp: The boundaries contained in this dataset can be used for analysis of areas defined in the Urban Audit 2012 and to produce thematic maps related to the cities.
dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3300

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: The unique identifier of the URAU entity
Source of population figures for the URAU entity
The code of the Local Administrative Unit's NUTS3 version 2010
Source of population figures for the Urban Centre
Y = The entity is a capital N = The entity is not a capital
The code of the Urban Centre
The area of the Local Administrative Unit in square kilometers into ETRS89 LAEA projection
The code of the Local Administrative Unit's NUTS3 version 2006
If the city or the Greater City is part of a FUA, it is the code of this FUA
The ISO code of the country
The name of the URAU entity

There are 3 categories of URAU entity: the city (the core City, using an administrative definition), the Greater City (aconcept introduced to improve comparability between large cities) and the FUA (approximating the functional urban area)
Y = The entity is a port N = The entity is not a port
